On a sweltering summer day, the world awoke to a bizarre phenomenon: the oceans had transformed into sparkling lemonade. Children squealed with delight, splashing in the tangy waves while seagulls swooped down, curiously pecking at the frothy surface. Scientists scrambled to explain the sudden citrus shift, but the cause remained a mystery. As people from all over flocked to the beaches, laughter echoed in the air. Amid the chaos, a young girl named Mia discovered a hidden message in a floating bottle. It read, “Share joy, and the world will taste sweeter.” That day, lemonade wasn’t just a drink; it was a reminder of the magic in togetherness.
